thread.title: Meet Bros win TIFFA for 'Chittiyaan Kalaiyaan'
thread.title_full: Meet Bros win TIFFA for 'Chittiyaan Kalaiyaan' - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Meet Bros win TIFFA for 'Chittiyaan Kalaiyaan'
text:
Composer duo Manmeet and Harmeet Singh, popularly known as Meet Bros, won the Best Composition Award at The Indian Icon Film Awards (TIFFA) 2015.
READ: â€‹ Meet Bros perform for kids battling cancer
"We are extremely thrilled to receive such a prestigious award. We are overwhelmed to receive such great response to the song. We hope to continue to entertain our fans always," the Meet brothers said in a statement.
For latest Music updates follow us on Twitter >>> @TOIEntertain
For the latest in Music news, like us on Facebook >>> TOIEntertain
LISTEN: Songs of Meet Brothers on Gaana.com
The duo delivered hits like 'Babydoll' and 'Chittiyaan Kalaiyaan' . They have also given music for films like All is Well , Hero , Calendar Girls , Welcome Back and Singh is Bliing and Ek Paheli Leela .
